title: Official LineageOS 18.1 builds released for Moto G 5G, Moto G 5G Plus, Motorola Edge
content:
LineageOS fans are patiently waiting for LineageOS 19.0, the next major version of the popular custom ROM based on Android 12. While we donâ€™t know when the new version will officially drop, the team continues to bring LineageOS 18.1 support to more devices. Late last month, we saw official LineageOS 18.1 builds being made available

The post Official LineageOS 18.1 builds released for Moto G 5G, Moto G 5G Plus, Motorola Edge appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Official builds of LineageOS 18.1 are now available for the Moto G 5G, Moto G 5G Plus, and Motorola Edge. Read on.
